name: XCTExpectedFailure
desc: An object that represents an expected test failure.

items.name: var failureReason: String?
items.desc: An optional string that describes why the test expects a failure.

items.name: var issue: XCTIssue
items.desc: The issue that fulfills the expected failure.

items.name: class XCTExpectedFailure.Options
items.desc: Options that determine how the test matches the expected failure to an actual test failure, and whether an unfulfilled expected failure results in a test failure.
